lokaye ma prathama warata ali athun lawa guwan yana addawu maleriya paryeshana guwan hamuda kandawurak sthapithawa thibu mehi athithaya walali yamata ida nodiya yuthu ya. 1945 di rajakiya guwan hamuda kandawura merata siwil guwan sewawata bara dimedi kandawure siti siwil sewakayin siyalu denama ekathu kara ‘guwangama’ namin gammanayak sthapitha kara ehi padinchi kala bawa sandahanya.
